subject: Failed to invoke suite():java.lang.StackOverflowError
msgSnippet: Hi, I am trying to create a TestSuite() containing just one Test.PLease(see the code attached),But I am getting Failed to invoke
messageBody:
Hi,
I am trying to create a TestSuite() containing just one
Test.PLease(see the code attached),But I am getting "Failed to invoke
suite():java.lang.StackOverflowError" every time i run it.The
interesting thing is that the test runs fine when I run it from
individually.Please guide.


package com.bms.csd.tests.beans;

import junit.framework.*;
import com.bms.csd.beans.*;
import com.bms.csd.helpers.*;
import com.bms.csd.common.*;

public class BeanTests{

public static void main(String[] args){
junit.textui.TestRunner.run(suite());
}

public static Test suite(){
TestSuite suite=new TestSuite();
suite.addTest(OverviewTest.suite());

return suite();
}

}
===========================

package com.bms.csd.tests.beans;

import junit.framework.*;
import com.bms.csd.helpers.*;
import com.bms.csd.common.*;
import com.bms.csd.beans.*;
import java.util.*;

public class OverviewTest extends TestCase {
protected OverviewHelper bean=null;

public OverviewTest (String name) {
super (name);
}

//public static void main (String [] args){
// junit.textui.TestRunner.run (suite());
//}

public static Test suite () {
return new TestSuite (OverviewTest.class);
}

protected void setUp() {
bean=new OverviewHelper();
}

protected void teraDown(){
bean=null;
}

// test for protocolNumber

public void testGetOverview(){
try{
StudyOverviewBean a = null;
a=bean.getOverview("CV168-007 ST","C14-ADME");
assertNotNull(a);
}catch(DataAccessException e){
fail("exception"+e);
}
}
}
